message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting a bit closer to your price, but I still think I can do better than $130. I'm willing to go up to $145, that's the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm really close to my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $132?
I'm not willing to go below $140, that's my minimum. I think we're close, but I need to make a decent profit on this sale. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
